title: The Guide log
creator_credit: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
brief_description: The story of the Girl Guides Association from the enrolment of a Brownie to the work of the Trefoil Guild or Senior Branch. Explains the work and play of the movement: social work, camping, cooking, keeping house, sailing, gliding, etc. Sequences include national dances performed by participation in an international guide camp.
